column5:
This week please download R and Rstudio.
Show Diana or Chante your dataset, and
complete the tutorials introduction to Rstudio

Introductions - roll call
Today we will cover R and Rstudio platform.

column4: Introduction to R and R studio

column5: "Nailed it!" What have you learned, attempted, or acomplished

Today we will explore how to get started.  Diana and I will demonstrate one method, over time you'll have your own process.  We will learn some best practices that are used by other coders as a statrting point for developing your own structure. In groups, you will practice developing an outline for your project and then begin to examine your dataset to identify what needs to be changed.
"Nailed it!" What have you learned, attempted, or acomplished
You will begin to tidy your dataset so that it will be in a format that can be easily used in R.

column4: Getting Started with Rmarkdown.  There are two videos that accompany the material we'll cover today.  You'll only need to watch the first 8 mins of the second video for our needs today, but the whole thing is useful.
column5: We are going to focus on preparing reproducibile documents
"Nailed it!" What have you learned, attempted, or acomplished
Today we will all use the same simple dataset to create a document for updating TBD.
